replies.author: PriceKill
replies.txt_content: 标题: [急在线等！]求牛逼技术戳进来，良辰感激不尽！！！              昨天玩权限组玩脱了，然后玩家没有任何权限！就连使用物品都不行！！求解答，如果我按照你的方法做好了，我给你钱QWQ  支付宝 QB 都行！{:10_522:}

吧，服务器关了，在FTP找到：plugins然后再到Essentials，或者在游戏里输入/ess reload

replies.author: PriceKill
replies.txt_content:
啊木哥 发表于 2015-10-7 09:56
懒得加，你就吧ESS插件的配置删了不就完事了...
是吧ESS插件的配置全部删除了，它自动生成的？

直接回复原来的配置不就好了，groupmanager恢复方法，打开groupmanager文件夹的worlds文件夹，然后将以下内容覆盖在groups.yml里面

# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    -builder
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: ture
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    - g:essentials_spawn
    info:
      prefix: '&2[生存者]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - '*'
    - -vanish.*
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
复制代码

replies.author: 小0w0卡
replies.txt_content: 打开你服务器里的plugins/Groupmanager/worlds/world/groups.yml，打开后，找到你的玩家所在的权限组，把build设置为true，然后重启服务器。望采纳！！

replies.author: 凯文丶
replies.txt_content: 楼主，把权限组文件删了，重新加载就可以了。

replies.author: Heer_Kaisair
replies.txt_content:
打开groups.yml
找到default：true 改成false
找到builder：false改成true
